description.p: The neptune escript is a tool for creating a skeleton erlang application or release using GNU Autotools as the build system.

desc.p: Create skeleton code with a build system in the directory name. By default the skeleton code is for an application and the directory is created in the current working directory.

item.p: Print the neptune version and exit.
Select which skeleton code type to create. By default an Erlang Application (app) is created.
Define the author. By default the author is set to undeclared author.
Define the email address. By default the email address is set to undisclosed email address.

section.title: Examples
section.p: Create skeleton code for an application called myapp in the current directory
Create skeleton code for a release called myrel in the /repo directory
Create skeleton code for an application called myapp in the current directory, setting the email address and author values accordingly.
